about_the_game:
See your favourite characters every time you are on your desktop with the new wallpaper pack!

Includes 6 high quality wallpapers with a never before released fully nude demon pic.

Find the wallpapers within the install folder inside "Wallpaper Pack"

Preview Images on store page are 1280x720, but the actual resolution of the wallpaper pack images are 3840x2160.

content_descriptors.notes: Nude depictions of each character in various poses.

detailed_description:
See your favourite characters every time you are on your desktop with the new wallpaper pack!

Includes 6 high quality wallpapers with a never before released fully nude demon pic.

Find the wallpapers within the install folder inside "Wallpaper Pack"

Preview Images on store page are 1280x720, but the actual resolution of the wallpaper pack images are 3840x2160.
name: Hentai Possess-Her - Wallpaper Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030
  • Storage: 24 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 24MB in addition to actual game download size

short_description: Love Hentai Possess-her? - now use it for your desktop background with this wallpaper pack.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
